meanings.definition: A type of stone used to start a fire.
meanings.sent1: The camper used firestones to light the campfire.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to bring some firestones when going camping.
meanings.sent3: The firestones decided to have a party and light up the night.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like striking firestones against each other.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tribe believed that firestones held the power of the sun within them.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic recommended replacing the old tires with Firestones.
meanings.sent2: My car runs smoothly with Firestones on it.
meanings.sent3: The Firestones tires rolled themselves into the garage for a check-up.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through life was as smooth as driving on Firestones.
meanings.sent5: The race car driver trusted only Firestones to keep him safe on the track.
